courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: THEA 371, THEA 372, THEA 373, and THEA 374, and concurrent registration in THEA 375, THEA 376 and THEA 377.
description: Development of acting skills for musical theatre including dance, singing, and the analysis of British and American musical theatre materials. A performance is given at the end of the term. Enrollment limited to Theatre majors.Prerequisite: THEA 371, THEA 372, THEA 373, and THEA 374, and concurrent registration in THEA 375, THEA 376 and THEA 377.
label: Acting Studio II: Acting
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Sophomore, Junior, or Senior class standing. Restricted to BFA:Theatre: Acting -UIUC.
